verses.verse: I would like it if you were tolerating me a little in this distraction, but you actually do tolerate me.
You see, I am impassioned about you with God's passion; for I arranged your marriage to one man: for a consecrated virgin to stand up next to the Anointed King.
But I am afraid that somehow as the snake completely fooled Eve with his slyness, so your thought processes might be worsened away from the dedication, the dedication for the Anointed King.

You see, certainly if the person coming speaks publicly about another Jesus whom we did not speak publicly about, or you receive a different spirit that you did not receive or different good news that you did not accept, you were tolerating it nicely.
You see, I consider myself to have lacked nothing from the super missionaries.
Even if I am an unskilled person with the message, still I am not unskilled with the information, still in every way we are people who were shown to you in all things.
Or did I commit a sin putting myself down low so that you might be put up high (because I shared the good news of God with you for free)?
I pilfered other assemblies when I took wages toward the task of serving you.

And as I was beside you facing you and when I was lacking, I didn't freeload off anyone. You see, my deficiency the brothers who came out of Macedonia furnished. And in everything, I kept and will keep myself weightless to you.
A truth of the Anointed King in me is that this bragging won't be shut up in me in the slopes of Achaia.
Why? Because I don't love you? God knows.
But what I do, I will also do so that I might chop out the opportunity of the people wanting an opportunity, so that they might be found in what they brag about to be also just like us.
You see, these types of people are fraudulent missionaries, deceptive workers, refashioning themselves into missionaries of the Anointed King.
And this is not amazing. You see, the Opponent refashions himself into an angel of light.
So it is not a huge thing, if his servants are also refashioned as servants of the right way, whose conclusion will be in line with their actions.
Again I say, "It should not seem to anyone for me to be distracted." But even if it definitely does, accept me as a distracted person so that I might also brag about a little something.
What I speak, I don't speak regarding the Master, but as in a distraction in this substance of the bragging.
Since many people brag regarding the physical body, I will also brag.
You see, you gladly tolerate the distracted people, you who are focused;
for you tolerate if someone makes you a slave, if someone eats up your food, if someone takes your things, if someone raises up, if someone beats you in the face.
In line with no value, I talk as if it were that we were weak. But in whatever some dare to be (I say in distraction), I also dare to be.
Are they Hebrew-speaking Jews? I also am. Are they Israelis? I also am. Are they Abraham's seed? I also am.

Are they servants of the Anointed King? (I who have the wrong focus am speaking) I am above that: much more in times of labor, too often in wounds, much more in jails, many times in life-threatening situations.
Under Jewish people, five times I received forty stripes minus one.
Three times I was beaten with a stick. Once I was attacked with stones. Three times I was shipwrecked. Night-and-day I have done in the deep sea,

many times in road travels, in dangers of rivers, in dangers of bandits, in dangers from family, in dangers from non-Jews, in dangers in the city, in dangers in the uninhabited place, in dangers in the sea, in dangers among fraudulent brothers,
in labor and hard work, many times in sleepless nights, in famine and thirst, in many times of going without food, in cold and nakedness.
Separate from the things, besides and outside of these, my tension, the tension daily, is the concern for all the assemblies.
Who is weak, and I am not weak? Who is tripped, and I am not inflamed?
If it is necessary to be bragging, I will brag about the things of my weakness.
(The God and Father of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King, knows, the One who is conferred with prosperity for the spans of time, that I am not lying.)
In Damascus, the governor under Aretas the king was watching over the city of Damascenes wanting to arrest me,
and through a window I was lowered in a rope basket through the wall and escaped from his hands.
